body:
Hello, I started playing on Avicus just over a day ago and have already fell in love with Nebula and Control the Hill. My IGN is GabeLB, but you can call me Gabe.

I checked out forums, and saw some OP team scrimmages on Youtube (https://avicus.net/forums/7fcd39d75) , it made me want to become a lot more involved with the server so I made a forums account.  I might even try to join a team in the future.

See ya in game

title: Ay I'm Gabe

replies.body: Hey Gabe! Welcome to Avicus, hope to see you around in the future!
replies.body_tagged: Hey Gabe! Welcome to Avicus, hope to see you around in the future!

replies.body:
Hey! Welcome to Avicus :D It's great to hear that you love the server ^-^
I hope to see you around in game sometime :) Make sure to follow the rules!
